item.title: Hard Times
item.description: Whatever you believe in, bring wishes of kindness to those who suffer.

item.title: Remembrance
item.description: A poem by Mike Davis about remembering the times when you had fortitude

item.title: Resilient Remembrance
item.description: “Stuck on the tarmac and then the terminal at O’hare on September 11, 2001, my son and I tried to figure out what to do, where to go, and how…”

item.title: Bold Edits
item.description: “Inexperienced Wikipedia editors (like myself) are reluctant to make changes on our own, especially when articles have automated warnings. Thankfully, Wikipedia endorses…”
